title: bhImA nadikkaraiyil oru piLLai
sahitya:
bhImA nadikkaraiyil oru piLLai tiriginrAnaDi uLLam koLLai koLLum oyyAran


anupallavi

  nAmAgha vazhi tEDa vENDAm avan nAmAvaLi sholla tAmAgha vandu kAmAdigaL ara karuNai koLLum oru


caraNam    tiruTTinukkE ezhudi varaindu vaittArp-pOl cittirak-karu nIla vaNNan cintai mayanga madu parugi 
tirindavar cellam tara oru aNNan iruTTil veLuttAghi eDuttu veLLam tANDi engO pOTTAnivan tandai 
ittaNaiyum marandu ivan cittamum koLLai koLLa ingE tiriginrAnaDi vindaiyilum vindai
